card.name: Surprise Attack
card.effect:
Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.
After combat: If Invisible Man is on a space with a fog token, move that fog token to another space.

card.name: Slip Away
card.effect: After combat: Move 1 fog token to a space without a fighter, then place Invisible Man on that space.

card.name: Emerge From Mist
card.effect: During combat: If Invisible Man started this turn on a space with a fog token, this card's value is 5 instead.

card.name: Snicker-Snack
card.effect: After combat: If you won the combat, look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card for them to discard.

card.name: O Frabjous Day
card.effect: After combat: Change size.

card.name: The Other Side of the Mushroom
card.effect: After combat: Move Alice up to 3 spaces. Change size.

card.name: Jaws That Bite
card.effect: After combat: Deal 2 damage to any one fighter adjacent to the Jabberwock.

card.name: Claws That Catch
card.effect: During combat: if the opposing fighter is a hero, this card's value is 5 instead.

card.name: Feeding Frenzy
card.effect: During combat: This card's value is +1 for each Sister in the same zone as the opposing fighter.

card.name: Disengage
card.effect: After combat: Choose an empty space in this fighter's zone. Place this fighter in that space.

card.name: Ambush
card.effect: During combat: Your opponent discards 1 random card. Add its BOOST value to this card's attack value.

card.name: Beastform
card.effect: During combat: You may discard any number of cards from your hand. This card's value is +1 for each card you discard.

card.name: Thirst of Sustance
card.effect: After combat: If you won the combat, place Dracula in any space adjacent to the opposing fighter.

card.name: jeet Kune Do: High Straight Lead
card.effect:
During combat: If either fighter started this turn in a different space, this card's value is 5 instead.
After combat: Gain 1 action.

card.name: Recoiling Blow
card.effect: After combat: Place Mr. Hyde in any space in his zone. Transform to Dr. Jekyll.

card.name: Forever Hyde
card.effect: During combat: You may discard Dr. Jekyll cards. Add 2 to this card's value for each card discarded.

card.name: Noble Sacrifice
card.effect: During combat: You may BOOST this attack. (This is in addition to any boost from King Arthur's special ability.)

card.name: The Aid of Morgana
card.effect: After combat: Draw 2 cards.

card.name: I'm Not Real
card.effect: After combat: You may change to your next identity.

card.name: Gaze of Stone
card.effect: After combat: If you won the combat, deal 8 damage to the opposing fighter.

card.name: Aid the Chosen One
card.effect: After combat: If you won the combat, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Swift Strike
card.effect: After combat: Move your fighter up to 4 spaces.

card.name: That's Why I Always Win
card.effect: During combat: You may BOOST this attack.

card.name: Wisdom of Ages
card.effect: After combat: Draw 1 card.

card.name: Five by Five
card.effect: After combat: Move Faith up to 5 spaces. She may move through opposing fighters.

card.name: Cursed With a Soul
card.effect: After combat: If you lost the combat, recover 1 health.

card.name: The Rush
card.effect: During combat: If Spike or the opposing fighter is in a space with a shadow token, the value of this card is 5 instead.

card.name: Flayed Alive
card.effect: During combat: (DARK) BLIND BOOST this attack.

card.name: They Rembember
card.effect: After combat: Gain 1 action.

card.name: Dismaying Shot
card.effect: After combat: Draw a number of cards equal to the amount of damage dealt to the opposing fighter.

card.name: Piercing Shot
card.effect: After combat: Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Highway Robbery
card.effect: Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card and ignore its defense value.

card.name: Clever Girl
card.effect: After combat: If one or more of your Raptors is adjacent to the opposing fighter, gain 1 action.

card.name: Pack Hunters
card.effect: After combat: If you won the combat, deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter for each of your Raptors adjacent to them.

card.name: Military Knowledge
card.effect: After combat: Draw 1 card.
